display_long_description:
Grab your sticks, drum up the beat and unleash your inner Taiko Master
                                                                                                                                
[media]

# DRUM UP THE BEAT
Taiko Frenzy is a percussion rhythm game set in a stunning, colorful scenery. Immerse yourself in fantasy world inspired by Japanese folklore with original soundtracks exclusively composed for the game.
Control the strength of your strikes to succeed in the accented beats and perfect your timing to the beat to unleash breathtaking sakura storms, boosting your score and creating a mesmerizing visual spectacle.

[media]

# PROGRESS AT YOUR OWN PACE
Each original track offers 4 difficulty levels providing a rewarding learning curve, easy to learn, hard to master! 
Climb the leaderboards and strive to unlock all the medals, aiming to become the ultimate Taiko Master.

[media]

# UNLOCK LEGENDARY SKINS
Your progress in songs is rewarded with XP and achievements, unlocking over 100 cosmetics. Satisfy your collector’s soul and showcase your unique style!

[media]

# EXPLORE COMMUNITY SONGS

Discover and play songs created by players worldwide with the in-game Community Songs browser!

# CREATE YOUR OWN SONGS
Let your creativity flow with the custom song feature and creation tool, enabling you to compose and play your personalized drumming masterpieces, putting your creativity in the spotlight.

[media]

Are you ready to take on the challenge? Download Taiko Frenzy now and drum your way to mastery!
